changeSet.author: Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_name where name in ( "CAI, Ictère", "CAI, Paleur des conjonctives", "CAI, Kaposi", "CAI, Type de consultation", "CAI, Admission - Données générales", "CAI, Contacts malade", "CAI, Noms", "CAI, Adresse physique", "CAI, Numéro Tél", "CAI, Anamnèse", "CAI, Plaintes à l\'admission et durée des symptômes", "CAI, Evaluation des symptômes TB", "CAI, Examen physique", "CAI, Stade OMS", "CAI, Etat général", "CAI, Yeux(IPD)", "CAI, Fond d\'oeil", "CAI, Bouche(IPD)", "CAI, Ganglions lymphatiques", "CAI, Cardio vasculaire", "CAI, Poumon", "CAI, Abdomen", "CAI, Hépatomégalie", "CAI, Splénomégalie", "CAI, Ascite", "CAI, Peau(KAPOSI?)", "CAI, Autres", "CAI, Examen neurologique", "CAI, Y (/4)", "CAI, V (/5)", "CAI, M (/6)", "CAI, Méningisme", "CAI, Nerfs crâniens", "CAI, Examen dy système moteur", "CAI, Examen de la sensibilité", "CAI, Examen de l\'équilibre", "CAI, Hypothèses diagnostics", "CAI, Informations Infections Opportunistes", "CAI, Infections opportunistes", "CAI, Status IO", "CAI, Informations Autres diagnostics", "CAI, Diagnostic", "CAI, Autre(si le diagnostic n\'est pas listé)", "CAI, Conduite à tenir", "CAI, Informations prophylaxie", "CAI, Prophylaxie", "CAI, Regime ARV", "CAI, Patient initié aux ARV ou changement de molécule?", "CAI, ARV Line", "CAI, Date début Regime ARV", "CAI, Motif début régime", "CAI, Traitement", "CAI, Effets secondaires - médicaments", "CAI, Molécule", "CAI, Effets secondaires", "CAI, Grade", "CAI, Issue de la consultation", "CAI, Mode d\'entrée (IPD)" ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" and voided = 0 AND locale = 'fr';

changeSet.comment: Adding concepts for Regime ARV form

changeSet.author: Pritam

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('CAI, Noms','CAI, Adresse physique','CAI, Numéro Tél') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'CAI, Contacts malade');
